message.content:
We need to add up only those transactions that represent an acquisition “of fixed assets” (that is, the ones whose type tells us “Fixed Assets Purchase”). In this dataset (ignoring the “Initial” fixed assets balance) there are two such rows:

• One row with id “FixedAsset20231231001” (the first one) with an amount of 758493.61  
• A later row with id “FixedAsset20231231001” (the second fixed‐asset purchase) with an amount of 1721500.92

Adding these two we get:
  758493.61 + 1721500.92 = 2479994.53

Thus, the final purchase of fixed assets is 2479994.53.

Below is the answer in the expected json format.

------------------------------------------------

```json
{"solution": {"Purchase of Fixed Assets": "2479994.53"}}
```
